thread.title: Durex is launching jeans and people are majorly amused
thread.title_full: Durex is launching jeans and people are majorly amused

author: Sohini Mitter
title: Durex is launching jeans and people are majorly amused
text:
Condom manufacturer Durex stirred up the Indian web this morning with a tweet announcing its entry into a new product category â€” denim jeans.
Yes, you read that right. #DurexJeans is now a thing.
SEE ALSO: Durex App Promises Discreet Condom Delivery on Demand
The jeans launch later this week and are being endorsed by Durex India's brand ambassador â€” popular Bollywood actor Ranveer Singh.
And he gets to try the first pair, as the teaser revealed.
Weâ€™re launching Jeans! And Ranveerâ€™s gonna be trying out his first ever. Excited? Well, thatâ€™s our speciality! #DurexJeans pic.twitter.com/5UpIJFVBfw
â€” Durex India (@DurexIndia) March 22, 2017
In a sponsored post in advertising and marketing publication, Brand Equity, a company official was Quote: d as saying: "We've got the world's best designers to draw out the very essence of Jeans keeping with the Durex style right down to the signature blue color and the 'twill' texture of the surface which gives strength and elasticity, the driving elements of the power and pleasure that come with it."
Image: et brand equity
Social media is buzzing with the news of #DurexJeans.
Durex is launching Jeans. So now you can go to a store and ask for a 32 inch Durex, and nobody will question :P pic.twitter.com/kYHAko1aUq
â€” Gabbbar (@GabbbarSingh) March 22, 2017
OMG Durex is launching Jeans! @RanveerOfficial are you gonna have sex with Durex on or off? #DurexJeans https://t.co/3qYjNNRbpr
â€” Tanmay Bhat (@thetanmay) March 22, 2017
@GabbbarSingh better be jeans because I cannot imagine some denim type condom.
â€” Prithi Ashwin (@prithinarayanan) March 22, 2017
Durex Jeans - instead of ripped jeans, we will have ribbed jeans.
â€” Naomi Datta (@nowme_datta) March 22, 2017
I think Durex should also start making spill proof bags. The world needs more of those. #DurexJeans
â€” Ankit (@ankitlunia2011) March 22, 2017
Well literally speaking #Durex did Get "INTO THE " Denims long back ... ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ pic.twitter.com/JeGrWaxzoj
â€” RJ Meenakshi (@RJMeenakshi1) March 22, 2017
In a dark room, now it will be heard "remove your Durex" in place of "wear a Durex" https://t.co/cQdzJ6FHa7
â€” Naresh Kumar Mathur (@mathur_nk) March 22, 2017
The best thing about #DurexJeans would be that you will only have to wear it since everytime someone else will take it offðŸ˜‚
â€” Manik Nayyar (@maniknayyar1) March 22, 2017
The Oddest News Of The Day! #Durex Got Into #Denims !! #Fashion is going way forward *wink* #Jeans #DurexJeans #FashionForward #news #Pretr pic.twitter.com/3gS0aBfJq5
â€” Pretr (@PretrApp) March 22, 2017
Durex's first association with Singh two years ago had caught fire too. Here's the #DoTheRex ad that sent advertising circles into a tizzy for being 'bold'.
Now onto denims!
